name: Harper Baldwin
text: Ok location for tasty pizza. The staff was very friendly and attentive. Feels similar to a restaurant in New York I loved.

name: Tavon Markov
text: The last few times I've ordered online from this particular restaurant, when I went to pick up, I order wasn't ready. And had to wait another 20 to 25 minutes for my food. It's almost like they don't even pay attention to online the quality …More

name: Maria Tischenko
text: Had over $300 worth of pizza for my sons 2nd birthday party. Most of the breadsticks burnt, half the pizza burnt and got my wings wrong. I ordered a week in advance to make sure they are aware of the big order. I’m not one to usually write bad reviews but I had to throw away all the breadsticks because they were not edible.

name: Darlene Cotherman
text: Food is great but dining area is still closed due to covid. I like the salad bar but not on the menu.

name: Stephanie Little
text: Pizza Hut pizza pizza ‘s are very good I have eaten there at there a couple of time’s and there pizza’s are very good it is I think that there pizza ‘s are worth it.

name: Robert Godzwa
text: Ordered pizza and wings. Delivered hot,on time and delicious. Thank you

name: Michael Writesel
text: It's usually a very good experience!

name: Scott Peterson
text: I will stop sometimes for their lunch buffet during the week.  The friendly staff is attentive and tries to keep a good number of pizzas out.  Even when it is unusually busy (as it was when I was there last) they did great.

name: Jaimee Perry
text: Spot on every time!

name: anthony sanza
text: Ordered carry out. $5 pepperoni pizza and $5 Hershey's chocolate chip cookie. Service was excellent and fast.  Will order again.

name: Jason Brown
text: Wish I could give a zero for service. Tried twice in the last six months at this place. In the dining room over a half hour to get waited on with TWO OTHER TABLES occupied in the place. Now today for my grand daughter’s birthday called in …More

name: kjken kelly
text: Love Pizza Hut! The best Pizza, no matter what style you choose. Quality and Experience in pizza, wings, Sandwiches, shines through. Best service, delivery, products in town! 2 Thumbs up and 5⭐ from me! Thanks to all Employees there, Great …More

name: Kegan Oldach
text: Absolutely terrible service. Pizza was supposed to be ready 30 min ago. Said it was ready 30 min ago. Have been sitting here waiting for 25 min and still not ready. It’s a football Sunday at 2pm and they have two employees working. The manger needs to be replaced at this location immediately.

name: Angela Estrada
text: The food on the salad bar tasted rancid and made my daughter sick. The pizza was fast but greasy. Server was nice and the place was relatively clean.

name: Zachery Somoles
text: I would rate 0 stars because I very much dont like when I receive my drink when someone else has clearly Opened it and had there self a nice chug of my Pepsi!! That is absolutely disgusting to the delivery driver named Alexandria! If you …More

name: MARK ADAMS
text: I usually go on wed night for the pizza buffet. It's good ... Mind you it's pizza hut. 5 stars for having fresh broccoli on the salad bar.

name: ashley gannon
text: Absolutely terrible. Their delivery obviously doesn’t work?! We waited 2.5 hours for 1 pizza. I have no idea what’s going on, I talk to the same person when I call (or it rings and rings and rings) and They all told me something different. …More

name: Melissa Burge
text: I like the buffet. Everyone gets to choose as they wish. Makes for a happy family.

name: Nancy Williams
text: I've had better tastings  pizza  there.  I don't  like the idea you have to have to order on line to get the specials.  Even if you go there in person you have to order on line so you better hope your phone is working good

name: Diane McLaughlin
text: Nice place new clean a fireplace

name: J R
text: Ordered meal for family at 9:30 . Now 11:10 no food and closed. No one picked up phones shortly before closing. Ridiculous ripoff. Now too late to order anything else and already paid. Absolutely terrible

name: Dennis Skelton
text: Hours listed on door clearly state closing time of 10:00pm Mon -Thu. Walked in at 9:01pm, and was refused service because "we don't seat anyone an hour before closing." …More

text: Friendly service. Nice atmosphere. Small lunch buffet selection. Overall, happy with my stop there.

text: The boss is always so tight on the employees and complains alot when she has to clear tables and after preparing a pizza they do not wash their hands had tons of customer service complaints when it comes to the freshness of the food I …More

name: Redflare 15
text: I wish I could hit zero. The service is horrible and the people are rude. There is no reason for a person to get a people job and they dont like people.

name: Marianne Grucza
text: It was ok there was only 1 girl there she was not with it tonight .I realize its friday but she for got I was there

name: Bev Z
text: Great Atmosphere! This fairly new building was designed with a little different vibe than we've typically seen here from Pizza Hut. Lunch buffets are a fast, inexpensive way to grab lunch. Always clean. Great service. They've been having weekend trials for the buffet at dinner too. Definitely a great place to stop

name: Patti Rose Life Happens
text: Nice salad bar and fresh hot pizza. Very enjoyable.

name: Steve G
text: I called 5 different times to place a order and the phone rang so much that it eventually stopped ringing all together. How do you expect to run a business if you refuse to answer the PHONE!! looks like ill order from Marco's. Thanks.

name: Jay Leslee
text: Wow, the girl on the phone was a complete mess. I hope the best for her. She was so slow and rude I had to cancel my order. People like that make me sick. For that reason I won't be going back or ordering take out from this place again. Good luck to the owner. I hope this individual don't scare more customers away.

name: Gerald Smithbauer
text: Just left the place a total of 4 people ( 3 ) tables so basically no one there. Waited over 10 minutes for a drink. The waitress honestly was nice. She said sorry for the wait but I had to wash glasses. Is that really her job with a table …More

name: Barry T
text: Pizza on the buffet was cold. Manager was not accommodating to customers. Actually somewhat rude. Just made a suggestion for what kind of pizza to put on buffet and they said can't do that. They used to do that. I miss the old days when they had adults running this place.

name: Renee Smith
text: Based on my personal experience.  The service was quite good.  I had a pizza ordered,  and walked it and they had it ready to go.  Good and quick service

name: FelixTheKig
text: Another case of “let’s ignore the customer”.  I placed a sample order at 11 AM. It is now 2:02 PM the online tracker has not updated, I have called the store multiple times and even let the phone rang for over 45 minutes and not a single …More

text: Bad beer. Waiter spilled marinara on our table and us. And shorted our change by $10 bucks

name: Katelynn Crissman
text: I ordered food at 11am and it's now almost 2pm. My food still has not been delivered.  I try calling the store and it just rings non stop and then gets cut off. I'm very upset with the service. The tracker just says making order. It doesnt take 2 hours to make chicken wings.

name: Logan Bell
text: The food was very good for a Pizza Hut. The server could have used some assistance.

name: Andrew DeSanctis
text: Unfortunately choose this location again for pickup tonight after previously arriving to find the "ovens are turned off" the last time we tried to dine in. Okay service by the host but terrible, dried out pizza after waiting for an order …More

text: The beer sucks, has a bad after taste. Waiter spilled marinara sauce on me and the guy shorted me $10.

text: Waited 15 mins and no service. No menus, or offer of drinks. Two families were eating. Otherwise, empty. We left. Lady leaving with is said she waited an hour for her order and they got it wrong. She ate anyway because she was hungry. Terrible service.

text: Was there for twenty minutes, didn't get menus, didn't get kids cups for children. text: Food can be hit or miss. Like i tell people, if you order from a pizza chain get the thin crust. I've been loyal to Pizza Hut because of the options they provide and they deliver when they say they will. Thin crust is good and they actually …More
